post.summary: Accept webhook from external provider via public route with signature verification
post.description:
This endpoint receives webhook callbacks from external providers without requiring
operator authentication when a valid provider signature is present. The tenant_id
is provided in the URL path to convey tenant context.

**Zoho Cliq Usage**: Configure Zoho Cliq outgoing webhooks to point to:
`POST /webhooks/zoho-cliq/{tenant_id}` with Authorization header set to:
`Bearer {POBLYSH_WEBHOOK_ZOHO_CLIQ_TOKEN}`

parameters.name: X-Connection-Id
parameters.description: Optional connection ID to target

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token for webhook verification (required for Zoho Cliq webhooks)

parameters.name: X-Hub-Signature-256
parameters.description: GitHub HMAC-SHA256 signature (required for GitHub webhooks)

parameters.name: X-Slack-Signature
parameters.description: Slack HMAC-SHA256 signature (required for Slack webhooks)

parameters.name: X-Slack-Request-Timestamp
parameters.description: Slack request timestamp (required for Slack webhooks)

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Provider slug (e.g., "github", "jira", "zoho-cliq")

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: Tenant UUID for scoping the webhook

404.description: Provider not found or connection not found for tenant/provider

RateLimitPolicyConfig.description: Rate limit policy configuration for handling provider rate limits

BASE_SECONDS.description:
Base retry interval in seconds (default: 5)

The starting backoff time when a rate limit is encountered.
Subsequent retries use exponential backoff: base_seconds * 2^attempts.

Environment variable: `POBLYSH_RATE_LIMIT_BASE_SECONDS`

JITTER_FACTOR.description:
Jitter factor for distributed systems (default: 0.1, range: 0.0-1.0)

Random factor applied to backoff calculations to prevent thundering
herd problems when multiple instances retry simultaneously.
Formula: backoff * (1 Â± jitter_factor)

Environment variable: `POBLYSH_RATE_LIMIT_JITTER_FACTOR`

MAX_SECONDS.description:
Maximum retry interval in seconds (default: 900)

Upper bound for exponential backoff calculations to prevent
excessively long retry delays. Must be >= base_seconds.

Environment variable: `POBLYSH_RATE_LIMIT_MAX_SECONDS`

PROVIDER_OVERRIDES.description:
Provider-specific rate limit policy overrides

Allows fine-tuning rate limits for specific providers that may have
different rate limit behaviors or requirements.

BASE_SECONDS.description:
Override for base retry interval for this provider

Environment variable: `POBLYSH_RATE_LIMIT_PROVIDER_OVERRIDE_{PROVIDER}_BASE_SECONDS`

JITTER_FACTOR.description:
Override for jitter factor for this provider

Environment variable: `POBLYSH_RATE_LIMIT_PROVIDER_OVERRIDE_{PROVIDER}_JITTER_FACTOR`

MAX_SECONDS.description:
Override for maximum retry interval for this provider

Environment variable: `POBLYSH_RATE_LIMIT_PROVIDER_OVERRIDE_{PROVIDER}_MAX_SECONDS`
